attributes.action: Put a stop to "over 60s exclusive" deals on homes in Devon and Cornwall.
attributes.additional_details: House prices in Devon and Cornwall are hugely inflated compared to the wages of most jobs in the region. Discounting homes for people over 60 and endlessly building retirement homes steals the chance of getting a house for young Devionians and Cornish people who want to stay in their home counties. Most of the over 60s own houses that are not "first home" suitable and often are from other regions so do not free up homes for people in their 20s and 30s who actually need somewhere to live.
attributes.background: Put a stop to "over 60s exclusive" deals on homes in Devon and Cornwall by preventing developers and estate agents from discounting homes for the elderly.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about property prices are a matter for the sellers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
